titleStmt.title: A copy of a letter, from the members of both hovses assembled at Oxford, to the Earle of Essex: dated the 27 of January, 1643. : With the names of those who signed it, desiring a treaty of peace. / Printed by order, to be published to the whole kingdom. Edw. Norgate,.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Norgate, Edward, d. 1650.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at Oxford, Ianuary 30. By Leonard Lichfield, printer to the university.,

notesStmt.note: "A list of the Lords and others who signed the letter": p. 6-8.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.

place.placeName: Ianuary 30. By Leonard Lichfield, printer to the university.
